ovdesc.p: This application is to be used, when a user has been forced out of the system and has then left details in the F.LOCKING and F.ACTIVITY files.

To clear a user from above files a record has to be entered using the (I)nput function. The key to this record is the ID of user to be cleared/reset. The the (A)uthorisation function must be run to actually perform the clear/reset and on successfully running the record is deleted from SIGN.ON.RESET file.
A different user is required to run the (A)uthorisation function from the one that ran the I(nput) function and neither user can be the user whose Id is being reset.

desc.p: Identifies the user whose details are to be removed from the F.LOCKING and F.ACTIVITY file.
The USER ID must be a valid key on the USER file.
The USER ID cannot be that of the Inputter or Authorisor.
Contains the name of the person that ran the Input function.
At the Input Stage the Inputters Id is stored on this field. Then at the Authorisation Stage a check is made that a different user to the one stored here is running the Authorisation.
Up to 16 alphanumeric characters. No Input field.
This field is provided for entering of notes, and is not used anywhere else.
Up to 35 alphanumeric characters. Multivalued. (Optional Input).
